hostages take thier chances.

Subject: Re: Trainer's Base/ To Hellpeon


> Hellpeon shakes his head to Darkfate as he asks about a spark
> signature.
>
> Hellpeon: "Our bodies and sparks are created of Chaochitan energy and
> thus we are one. As for your troops in the base... they are
> expendable, I am expendable, you are expendable, all are expendable
> in the eyes of the Bamphomet. It is the only being that is not
> expendable. Therefore if your troops are in the base when it is
> destroyed, they will not be thought of for another second. Now will
> you help in destroying all in that base and the base itself and revel
> and the powers and gifts of the Bamphomet or shall you stand in our
> way and ultimately be obliterated?"
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Darkfate::
> >
> > "What luck!!!" said Darkfate "We're rescuing our allies from that
> > base's stasis field... before I'd have enough to trhow trainers out
> > the area... but now I want... erm... destroy them... " the male
> > opened his comm link "Do you have spark signature in order to my
> > troops can know that we're working together... By now?"
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > > As all the blasts convrged on hellpeon, the Infecticon laughed.
> > > Before any of them struck him the field of Chaochitan energy once
> > > again surrounded his body as each shot struk the massive beat
> > > creating a large explosion. Once again as the smoke cleared the
> > being
> > > seemed unphased that is until Darkfate flew up to him and spoke.
> > > Before the blast he fired sturck the bot it seemingly flew down
> > > straight at the trainers base, if it hit the shields it would
> > likely
> > > be a devestating hit if it hit the ground it would leave a very
> > large
> > > crater. The being turned to Darkfate and tilted its head to the
> > side.
> > >
> > > Hellpeon: "...Warrior? I am the Infecticon Enforcer Hellpeon...
> As
> > > for an alliance my leader may consider it if you help destroy
> that
> > > base and all in it..."
> > >
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > Darkfate::
> > > >
> > > > Darkfate took off and opened his comm link in all Predacons
> > > > Frecuencies "To all Drillbit's, Killfest's and BlackFortress's
> > > > troops" said the male"Stop firing... I'll try to do
> somethign..."
> > > >
> > > > The male flew towards Hell Peon and said to him "YOu're a good
> > > > warrior... Who're you and what's your faction? perhaps we can
> > make
> > > an
> > > > alliance..."
> > > >
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > > > > ::Slayer::
> > > > >
> > > > > Slayer is hit by one shot from the Trainer base, cursing to
> > > > himself.
> > > > > He was a friggin' member of the Trainers, and the base was
> > firing
> > > > at
> > > > > him! He knew why, but he was still a bit ticked at it.
> > > > >
> > > > > Flying back, Slayer aims his shoulder blasters and fires
> > several
> > > > > shots at Hellpeon.
